member.summary: Stream container.

member.summary: Container name (e.g. mp4, webm, etc). Can be used as file extension.

member.name: P:YoutubeExplodeNoPolytics.Videos.Streams.Container.IsAudioOnly
member.summary: Whether this container is a known audio-only container.
member.remarks: This property only refers to the container's capabilities and not its actual contents. If the container IS audio-only, it DOES NOT contain any video streams. If the container IS NOT audio-only, it MAY contain video streams, but is not required to.

member.summary: MPEG-2 Audio Layer III (mp3).
member.remarks: YouTube does not natively provide streams in this container.

member.summary: MPEG-4 Part 14 (mp4).
